Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kostner, Ogden and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Kilbourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via26th, Kostner, Ogden and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Kilbourn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Ohio

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Kimball, Jackson, Kedzie, Chicago and Homan due to, street blockage near Homan/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Pine
